officialTitle: Long-term Single-arm Open-label Study, to Assess the Safety and Tolerability of ACT-293987 in Patients With Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension
summary: Long-term, single-arm, multicenter, open-label extension, Phase 3 study, to evaluate the safety and tolerability of ACT-293987 in patients with PAH who participated in the double-blind study AC-065A302 (GRIPHON)

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment-emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs) up to 3 Days After Study Intervention Discontinuation
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Up to 3 days after study drug discontinuation (Up to 10.5 years)
